item.title: How to import your ERC-20 CMTs
item.description: First, you’ll need to download the CyberMiles App to your device. Once downloaded, select “Import Wallet” at the bottom of your screen. There are three (3) ways to import your ERC20 CMT: by mnemonic words, private key, or keystore. Choose one of these methods**. **Note: During your import, be advised that you must remember your mnemonic words, private key, or keystore and password, and your imported CMT wallet’s password. Mnemonic words To import using your saved mnemonic words, simply select the source of the words, then create a new password, and import your wallet.
